p: According to the Italian Government surveillance project “Okkio alla salute”, 21.3% of primary school children were overweight and 9.3% obese. Between the years 2008 and 2016, the prevalence of obesity decreased from 12% to 9.3% (with a percentage reduction of about 22%), while overweight prevalence decreased from 23.2% to 21.3% (with a percentage reduction of about 8%).
